name: The Refinery
tagline: Improved engagement with digital product catalogs
description:
Most consumers hit the “back” button on your product catalog before they find what they're interested in.  We help digital product marketers and their agencies improve the path to purchase, which leads to paying, brand loyal consumers.
By analyzing your digital shelf, our team at The Refinery will provide you insights into opportunities to improve.  From there, we implement those changes into your existing website and mobile products, or work hand in hand with your agency to do so.
